channel.title: Comments on: It’s an animal thing
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: I was a huge fan of Pitch Black, but I was a bit disappointed in Chronicles of Riddick. But maybe I should check it out again... I did only watch it once. I like the new "organic" lists. I agree that it's difficult to keep stuff ranked in stone. Take care, Drey.Jeff
item.content:encoded: I was a huge fan of Pitch Black, but I was a bit disappointed in Chronicles of Riddick. But maybe I should check it out again… I did only watch it once. I like the new “organic” lists. I agree that it’s difficult to keep stuff ranked in stone. Take care, Drey.Jeff

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: It all just makes me want to learn how to ice someone with a tea-cup:)But perhaps that's a bit anti-social of me... Really dig that movie.Thanks for the lists...
item.content:encoded: It all just makes me want to learn how to ice someone with a tea-cup:)But perhaps that’s a bit anti-social of me… Really dig that movie.Thanks for the lists…
